member.name: M:ThumbnailSharp.ThumbnailCreator.CreateThumbnailStream(System.UInt32,System.String,ThumbnailSharp.Format)
member.summary: Create a thumbnail from file and returns as stream.
member.param: Thumbnail size. For portrait image, thumbnail size must be less than its height. For landscape image, thumbnail size must be less than its width. For the same size image (Proportional), thumbnail size must be less than its width and height.
member.returns: A thumbnail image as stream. Returns null if it fails.
